title: Dread Iron Dagger
content:
als an extra 1~6 Necrotic damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A web of veins runs the length of the blade - it has become a slender iron mortuary for all the innocents it has tasted.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown

Dread Iron Dagger is one of the Dagger Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Dread Iron Dagger is a magic dagger that deals extra necrotic damage while hidden. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile
